# Avali
The Avali are a species of lightweight feathered raptor-like humanoids.
## Benefits
- Resists cold temperatures easily, and is slowed less by the cold then other species. - As a species of predators, they are naturally skilled with ranged weapons, having 35% less spread when firing them.
## Special
- Their claws deal Slash damage. - Slightly lighter then other species. - Low specific heat, meaning changes in heat will have a greater magnitude.
## Drawbacks
- Dangerously sensitive to high temperatures. Begins to suffer heat damage at a lower threshold, and takes much more of it then other species. Due to this, [color=red]Leporazine is highly dangerous[/color], and potentially lethal at higher doses. - As a lightweight species, they tend to be a bit frail, taking [color=#ffa500]30% more blunt damage[/color], as well as [color=#ffa500]10% more slash and pierce[/color]. - For the same reason, they lack muscle, dealing 35% less blunt damage and 15% less slash and stamina damage.
